mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TUPYO(TUPY_SEQ, TUPY_CLAS_ID, TUPY_TOTAL_USER, TUPY_STARTDATE, TUPY_ENDDATE, TUPY_STATUS) VALUES(TUPY_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{tupyClasId}, #{tupyTotalUser}, CURRENT_DATE , #{tupyEnddate}, 'P')
INSERT INTO TUPYO_OPTION(TUOP_SEQ, TUOP_TUPY_SEQ, TUOP_INSTR, TUOP_FEE) VALUES(TUOP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tuopTupySeq}, #{tuopInstr}, #{tuopFee})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_CHAMYEOJA cc WHERE CLCH_CLAS_ID =#{clchClasId} AND CLCH_YEOKAL IN ('M','S') AND CLCH_STATUS ='Y'

SELECT TUUS_SEQ ,TUUS_OPTION_SEQ,TUUS_ACCOUNT_ID,TUUS_AGREE FROM TUPYO_USER WHERE TUUS_ACCOUNT_ID = #{tuusAccountId} AND TUUS_OPTION_SEQ IN ( SELECT TUOP_SEQ FROM TUPYO_OPTION WHERE TUOP_TUPY_SEQ = #{tuopTupySeq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TUPYO_USER(TUUS_SEQ, TUUS_OPTION_SEQ, TUUS_ACCOUNT_ID, TUUS_AGREE) VALUES(TUUS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tuusOptionSeq}, #{tuusAccountId}, 'A')
mapper.select: SELECT ot.TUOP_SEQ, NVL(tu.count, 0) as COUNT FROM TUPYO_OPTION ot LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TUUS_OPTION_SEQ, COUNT(*) as count FROM TUPYO_USER WHERE TUUS_OPTION_SEQ IN ( SELECT TUOP_SEQ FROM TUPYO_OPTION to2 WHERE TUOP_TUPY_SEQ =( SELECT TUOP_TUPY_SEQ FROM TUPYO_OPTION to2 WHERE TUOP_SEQ =#{tuopTupySeq} ) ) GROUP BY TUUS_OPTION_SEQ) tu ON ot.TUOP_SEQ = tu.TUUS_OPTION_SEQ WHERE ot.TUOP_TUPY_SEQ =(SELECT TUOP_TUPY_SEQ FROM TUPYO_OPTION WHERE TUOP_SEQ =#{tuopTupySeq}) ORDER BY TUOP_SEQ
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TUPYO_USER tu WHERE TUUS_ACCOUNT_ID =#{tuusAccountId} AND TUUS_OPTION_SEQ =#{tuusOptionSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT TUUS_SEQ ,TUUS_OPTION_SEQ ,TUUS_ACCOUNT_ID ,TUUS_AGREE FROM TUPYO_USER tu WHERE TUUS_OPTION_SEQ =#{tuusOptionSeq} AND TUUS_AGREE =#{tuusAgree} ORDER BY TUUS_SEQ DESC
